nodes.text: The sun of the Datar system in the Inner Rim was orbited by the planet Datar. In the early centuries of the Galactic Republic, the Duros hyperspace trailblazer Gan Basso died when he accidentally crashed his vessel into the star after a hasty hyperspace jump.
The Datar system's sun was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
